item.title: What was the most valuable position in the NBA during the 2019-2020 season?
item.description: One of the longest held debates amongst NBA fanatics is over which player deserves the Most Valuable Player (MVP) award for each given season. It is a purposefully subjective award meant that stirs the pot and incites heated arguments between both media members and fans about what value really means in the NBA. library(tidyverse) ## Warning: package 'tidyverse' was built under R version 4.0.4 ## -- Attaching packages --------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.
